components.name: hero
components.heading: Identify turnover and liabilities, for better KYC/AML for SMEs.
components.description: Access to account information guarantees the enhancement of current KYC and AML processes.

pills.heading: Enhance KYC
pills.description: Access to account information identifies current liabilities that currently, are not visible in any other way.

pills.heading: A better AML process
pills.description: Income verification and identity verification can help reducing fraud and improve your AML process.

pills.heading: Reduce operational costs
pills.description: Save time and money that you would, otherwise, spend seeking information on a customer.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Use case
components.heading: Know Your Customer (KYC)
components.html: SMEs that wish to get a better deal when it comes to lending, have better possibilities by allowing access to their account data. By identifying turnover in real time through Open Banking (PSD2), banks and lenders can make wiser decisions and eventually give a better offer. On the other hand, lenders might be interested in current liabilities for the customer, that cannot be found in credit bureaus. Combining this information with analysis offered from our solution in real time makes Open Banking a powerful tool in the KYC process.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Use case
components.heading: Anti Money Laundering (AML)
components.html: Financial institutions are continuously obliged to spot and filter out fraudulent activity. With direct and real time access to applicant's bank account with Open Banking (PSD2), it becomes harder to fraud. Our solution can verify income, years back and not just the last two months. It can also combine account data with the lender's database to match applicant's identity even if this information is not provided by Open Banking (PSD2). Both are crucial for reducing fraud and improving your AML process.

components.name: contact
components.heading: Ready to improve KYC/AML?
components.description: We are here to help you use Open Banking to improve your KYC/AML and cut on operational costs. Get in touch.
